name: spaghetti
description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with long, thin noodles, typically topped with a tomato-based sauce and often served with meatballs or grated cheese.

name: fried chicken
description: Crispy and juicy chicken pieces that are breaded and deep-fried until golden brown, creating a deliciously crunchy exterior while maintaining moist and tender meat inside.

name: pancit cantoon
description: A Filipino stir-fried noodle dish made with egg noodles, vegetables, meat (such as pork, chicken, or shrimp), and soy sauce. It is commonly served during celebrations and gatherings.

name: siomai rice
description: A popular Filipino dish consisting of steamed or fried dumplings filled with a mixture of ground pork, shrimp, and seasonings, served alongside steamed rice. Siomai is often accompanied by a dipping sauce made with soy sauce, calamansi juice, and chili.
